name: Where-Am-I
tagline: Where Am I app allows user to send their current location via SMS or eMail
body: Where Am I app allows user to send their current location via SMS or eMail. This is handy when you have no idea where you are. It will extract a physical address and its geolocation and form a SMS or eMail.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
